dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.goToSettingsToConfigureApiKey: Go to settings to configure the API key

settings.themeDescription: Choose between light and dark mode
settings.exportDescription: Download a backup of your financial data
settings.importDescription: Restore your data from a backup file
settings.confirmClearLogs: Are you sure you want to clear all debug logs?
settings.appDescription: Track your assets, liabilities, income, and expenses to achieve financial independence.
settings.debugModeDescription: Additional debug features are enabled. Disable in production.
settings.clearPartialDataDescription: Deletes all financial data (assets, expenses, liabilities, etc.) but keeps settings like API keys and exchange rates
settings.clearAllDataDescription: Deletes all data including API keys and settings
settings.confirmClearPartialData: Are you sure you want to delete all financial data? This cannot be undone.
settings.confirmClearAllData: Are you sure you want to delete ALL data including API keys? This cannot be undone.
settings.enableStockApiDescription: Enable or disable the stock API integration
settings.getFinnhubKey: Get your free API key from
settings.stockMarketCurrencyDescription: Choose the currency for displaying stock prices. USD shows original prices, EUR converts USD prices to Euro using current exchange rates.

forecast.title: Financial Forecast
forecast.passiveIncomeCoverage: Coverage of all expenses by passive income

bufferMilestone.title: Safety Buffer
bufferMilestone.description: Track how many months of total expenses (fixed and known variable expenses) your liquid funds could cover. This financial buffer provides security and confidence for investment decisions.
bufferMilestone.noExpenses: No expenses recorded yet. Add your recurring expenses to build your safety buffer.
bufferMilestone.milestone2: 2 months of expenses covered - basic emergency fund achieved!
bufferMilestone.milestone4: 4 months of expenses covered - safety net is growing!

totalExpenseCoverage.title: Total Expense Coverage
totalExpenseCoverage.description: Track the percentage of your total monthly expenses covered by passive income. This includes all expenses, including fixed costs, variable costs, and debt repayments.
totalExpenseCoverage.noExpenses: No expenses recorded yet. Add your expenses to monitor total expense coverage.
totalExpenseCoverage.milestone25: 25% of total expenses covered by passive income!
totalExpenseCoverage.milestone50: Halfway there! 50% of expenses covered by passive income
totalExpenseCoverage.milestone75: Almost there! 75% of expenses covered by passive income
totalExpenseCoverage.milestone100: Full financial freedom achieved! All expenses covered by passive income üéâ

leisureMilestone.title: Leisure Coverage
leisureMilestone.description: See how much of your personal and entertainment expenses are covered by passive income. FIRE is not just about necessities, but also about enjoying life.
leisureMilestone.noExpenses: No leisure expenses recorded yet. Add your entertainment and personal expenses.
leisureMilestone.milestone25: 25% of leisure costs covered by passive income!
leisureMilestone.milestone50: Half of your fun money is now passive! üéâ
leisureMilestone.milestone75: 75% of leisure costs covered - freedom is near!
leisureMilestone.milestone100: All leisure costs covered by passive income! üéÆ

fixedCostFreedom.title: Fixed Cost Freedom
fixedCostFreedom.mainDescription: Track the percentage of your monthly fixed costs covered by passive income.
fixedCostFreedom.categories: ‚Ä¢ Monthly recurring expenses: housing, transportation, utilities, insurance, and healthcare
fixedCostFreedom.debtPayments: ‚Ä¢ All monthly debt repayments (mortgages, loans, credit cards, etc.)
fixedCostFreedom.exclusionNote: üí° Note: Leisure and variable costs are not included in fixed costs.
fixedCostFreedom.breakdown:
Breakdown:
‚Ä¢ Monthly recurring expenses: {{expenses}}/month
‚Ä¢ Monthly debt repayments: {{debts}}/month
fixedCostFreedom.milestone25: 25% of fixed costs covered by passive income!
fixedCostFreedom.milestone50: Halfway there! 50% of fixed costs covered
fixedCostFreedom.milestone75: Almost there! 75% of fixed costs covered
fixedCostFreedom.milestone100: Financial freedom achieved! All fixed costs covered by passive income üéâ
fixedCostFreedom.noFixedCosts: No fixed costs recorded yet. Add your recurring expenses and debt repayments to start tracking.

debtBreaker.title: Debt Payoff Progress
debtBreaker.description: Track your progress in paying off debts
debtBreaker.milestone25: 25% of debts paid off - on the right track!
debtBreaker.milestone50: Halfway there! 50% of debts paid off
debtBreaker.milestone75: 75% of debts paid off - almost there!
debtBreaker.milestone100: All debts paid off! You are now debt free! üéâ
debtBreaker.noDebt: No debts recorded yet. Add your liabilities to track your progress to debt freedom.

debtCoverage.title: Debt Coverage
debtCoverage.description: Monitor how well your passive income covers your debts. Higher coverage means less financial stress and more freedom.
debtCoverage.noDebts: No debts recorded yet. Add your liabilities to monitor your debt coverage.
debtCoverage.percentCovered: {{percent}}% of debts covered by passive income
debtCoverage.milestone10: 10% of debts covered by passive income - a good start!
debtCoverage.milestone25: 25% of debts covered by passive income - on the right track!
debtCoverage.milestone50: 50% of debts covered by passive income - halfway to financial freedom!
debtCoverage.milestone100: All debts covered by passive income! You are now debt free! üéâ

liabilities.title: Liabilities
liabilities.noLiabilitiesDesc: Track your loans, mortgages, and other debts to get a complete overview of your finances.

income.noIncomeDesc: Add your income sources to track your earnings and calculate your cash flow.
